    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginController

        public LoginController()

    • Method Detail

      • loginStaff

        public void loginStaff()
        This method tries to log in a staff member based on the values that are present in the usernameField and passwordField. Value of the username field will be trimmed before being used. If the authentication fails, a call to either Alerts.failure(String) or displayInternalErrorAlert(Exception) will be displayed to the user (based on the received exception).

        This method is called by a click event triggered by the loginButtonStaff button.

      • displayActionCenter

        protected void displayActionCenter()
        Navigates to the staff action center view using the router.

      • displayClientActionCenter

        protected void displayClientActionCenter()
        Navigates to the client action center view using the router.

      • displayInternalErrorAlert

        protected void displayInternalErrorAlert(java.lang.Exception e)
        Displays an alert popup to the user indicating an expected error occurred.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception to show the detail of in the popup

      • loginClient

        public void loginClient()
        This method tries to log in a client based on the value present in the clientIdField. Value of the client ID field will be trimmed before being used. If the authentication fails, a call to either Alerts.failure(String) or displayInternalErrorAlert(Exception) will be displayed to the user (based on the received exception).

        This method is called by a click event triggered by the loginButtonStaff button.
